title: Egypt 2x1
country: Cairo, Cruise: Aswan, Kom Ombo, Edfu and Luxor, Cairo
description: Embark on a fascinating adventure through the ancient land of Egypt with our amazing 2x1 offer. Enjoy 4 nights in Cairo, exploring the mysteries and wonders of this iconic city, followed by 3 nights aboard a cruise on the majestic Nile River. This trip will take you through a unique experience, visiting iconic places like Aswan, Kom Ombo, Edfu, and Luxor. With departures available on Tuesdays and Sundays from April 9 to September 30, you have the perfect opportunity to immerse yourself in the history and culture of this legendary land. Our package includes everything you need to enjoy to the fullest: from domestic flights and transfers toaccommodation in hotels and the cruise, as well as guided tours to discover the treasures of Egypt with the assistance of local experts. Don't miss this unique opportunity to explore Egypt with a travel companion. Book now and live an unforgettable experience!

title: San Andrés
description: Discover the unique beauty of San Andrés with our exciting 7-night tour package. Departing on November 7, 2024 from Mendoza with Copa Airlines, you will embark on an unforgettable experience in this Caribbean paradise. During your stay, you will be hosted at the exclusive Ataraxy Boutique Hotel, where each day will begin with a delicious included breakfast to prepare you for your adventures on the island. In addition, we offer traveler assistance to guarantee your peace of mind throughout the trip. Dive into the crystal clear waters, explore the vibrant coral reefs and relax on the white sand beaches while you delight in the stunning views and warm hospitality of San Andrés. Get ready to live an unforgettable experience in this paradise destination in the Caribbean!

title: Grecia y Turquía
country: Estambul, Capadocia, Pamukkale, Éfeso, Atenas, Mykonos, Santorini y Patmos
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey through Greece and Turkey with our exciting 12-night tour package, departing May 31, 2024 from Ezeiza with Turkish Airlines. This trip will take you to discover the cultural and natural treasures of two fascinating countries. Starting in Turkey, you'll explore Istanbul, captivating Cappadocia, stunning Pamukkale and the ruins of Ephesus, all accompanied by quality hotels, transfers and guided tours. In addition, you will enjoy an exciting flight to Cappadocia for a unique experience. But the adventure doesn't end there: you will embark on a luxurious 4-day cruise that will take you to Athens, Mykonos, Santorini and Patmos, where you will enjoy full board and witness the incomparable beauty of the Greek islands. With breakfast included throughout the tour and 4 dinners in Turkey, along with the assistance of an escort guide at the destination (except during the cruise) and traveler assistance, this package offers you everything you need for a worry-free and fulfilling travel experience. of unforgettable moments. Get ready to live a unique experience in Greece and Türkiye!

title: Turquía
description: Embark on a fascinating adventure through Turkey with our exciting tour package available for departures from June to October, offering 10 nights of unforgettable exploration. Departing from Ezeiza with Turkish Airlines, you will immerse yourself in the rich history and incomparable beauty of this fascinating country. This trip includes everything you need for a worry-free experience: from air travel with checked and carry-on luggage to arrival and departure transfers. Enjoy accommodation with breakfast included in each destination, as well as guided tours and excursions in Istanbul, Cappadocia, Pamukkale and Kusadasi, where you will discover the cultural and natural treasures of Turkey. With the company of an expert accompanying guide and the peace of mind of traveler assistance, you can fully immerse yourself in the magic of this unique destination. Get ready to create unforgettable memories in Türkiye!

title: Turkey
description: Turkish Airlines economy class airfare. Circuit visiting Istanbul, Cappadocia, Pamukkale, and Kusadasi. 9 nights accommodation in 4-star hotels. Transfers. Panoramic tours in Cappadocia, Pamukkale, Ephesus, and Bursa.

title: Journey through Romania and Bulgaria
description: Airfare flying with Lufthansa in economy class. Circuit visiting Bucharest, Sibiu, Bistrita, Bucovina, Piatra Neamt, Brasov, Veliko Tarnovo, Burgas, Plovdiv, and Sofia. Includes accommodation in 4-star hotels with breakfast. Transfers by bus, Spanish-speaking guides and local guides, visits, and excursions.

title: Wonders of Spain, Italy, and France
description: Airfare flying with Aerolíneas Argentinas in economy class. Circuit visiting Madrid, Zaragoza, Barcelona, Costa Azul, Pisa, Rome, Montepulciano, San Gimignano, Tuscany region, Florence, Pistoia, Veneto region, Verona, Milan, Annecy, Lyon, Troyes, Paris, Tours, Bordeaux, Lourdes, and San Sebastián. Includes accommodation with breakfast, (15) meals as per itinerary, visits, excursions, and traveler assistance.

title: Golden Temple and Maldives
description: Airfare flying with Emirates BUE/DEL/MLE/BUE in economy class. Visiting Delhi, Amritsar, Agra, Jaipur, Udaipur, Varanasi, Mumbai, and Maldives. Accommodation in superior 4-star hotels with breakfasts, 2 lunches, and All Inclusive in Maldives. Transfers with Spanish-speaking guide and internal air tickets.

title: Complete Thailand and Istanbul
description: Airfare flying with Turkish Airlines in economy class. Visiting Bangkok, Kanchanaburi, Ayutthaya, Lopburi, Sukhothai, Chiang Rai, Chiang Mai, Krabi, Phuket, Phi Phi, and Istanbul. Includes 20 nights with breakfast, 15 meals. Excursions with entrance fees. Visit to elephant sanctuary and assistance.

title: China Hong Kong and Singapore
description: Airfare flying with Emirates in economy class. Visiting Beijing, Pingyao, Xi'an, Guilin, Hangzhou, Suzhou, Shanghai, Hong Kong, and Singapore. Accommodation in 4-star hotels with breakfast. Includes 12 lunches and 1 dinner. Transfers. Spanish-speaking guide. Internal airfare.

title: Jamaica
description: Airfare Mendoza - Montego Bay with Copa Airlines. (Carry-on only). Transfers in and out. Accommodation for 7 nights at Iberostar Rose Hall Beach. All inclusive. Universal Master Plus Medical Assistance 08D.

title: Punta Cana
description: Airfare Mendoza - Punta Cana with Copa Airlines. (Carry-on only). Transfers in and out. Accommodation for 7 nights at Impressive Punta Cana. All inclusive. Universal Master Plus Medical Assistance 8D.

title: Cartagena
description: Airfare Mendoza - Cartagena. (Carry-on only). Transfers in and out. Accommodation for 7 nights at Capilla del Mar with breakfast included.

title: Turkey and Greece with Delphi and Meteora
description: Airfare flying with Turkish in economy class. 17 nights touring Istanbul, Ankara, Cappadocia, Pamukkale, Kusadasi, Samos, Mykonos, Santorini, Athens, and Meteora. Includes accommodation in 4-star hotels (Istanbul in Taksim area). Transfers, tours, and 6 meals included.

title: Cruise through Uruguay
description: Embark on a unique adventure with the Costa Favolosa Cruise through Uruguay! Enjoy a 3 or 4-night mini cruise with departures available on December 6, 10, 13, and 17. With the purchase of your cruise, we give you the drinks so you can fully enjoy your experience! Explore the wonders of Uruguay from the comfort and luxury of the Costa Favolosa. With rates subject to availability at the time of confirming the reservation, secure your spot on this exciting journey. Additionally, please note that additional taxes, approximately 123 USD, will apply to ensure a worry-free experience. Don't miss the opportunity to discover the beauty of Uruguay as you sail along its coasts. Book now and get ready for an unforgettable experience aboard the Costa Favolosa Cruise!

title: Cruise through Brazil
description: Embark on an exciting adventure with the Costa Favolosa Cruise through Brazil! Enjoy a mini cruise with departures available on January 5 and 13, as well as on January 21 and 29, February 6 and 22, and March 2, 10, and 18. With the purchase of your cruise, we give you the drinks so you can fully enjoy your experience! Explore the wonders of Brazil from the comfort and luxury of the Costa Favolosa. With rates subject to availability at the time of confirming the reservation, secure your spot on this exciting journey. Additionally, please note that additional taxes, approximately 306 USD, will apply to ensure a worry-free experience. Don't miss the opportunity to discover the beauty of Brazil as you sail along its spectacular coasts. Book now and get ready to live unforgettable moments aboard the Costa Favolosa Cruise!

title: Turquía 2X1
country: Estambul, Anakara, Capadocia, Pamukkale, Éfeso, Kusadasi, Bursa
description: Airfare from Buenos Aires. Transfers in/out. 10 nights accommodation with breakfast

title: Buzios presale
description: Air from Mendoza with Carryon. Transfers in/out. Hotel subject to availability. Breakfast

title: Turquía and Dubai 2X1
country: Estambul, Anakara, Lago Salado, Capadocia, Pamukkale, Éfeso, Kusadasi/Izmir, Bursa and Dubai
description: Air from Mendoza with Carryon. Transfers in/out in both countries. Tourist bus tour with English speaking guides in Turkey. Activities at destination according to itinerary. Entrance fees to museums in Turkey. 4 meals during the tour in Turkey. Accommodation with breakfast.

title: Faranoic Egypt 2X1
country: Cairo, Nile River Cruise with full board and Hurghada all inclusive.
description: 4 nights accommodation in Cairo with breakfast. Tour of Cairo with English speaking guides. 3 nights cruise on the Nile River with full board. 3 nights in Hurghada all inclusive. Transfers in/out. Internal flights. Activities at destination according to itinerary

title: Turquía 2X1
country: Estambul, Anakara, Lago Salado, Capadocia, Pamukkale, Éfeso, Kusadasi/Izmir and Bursa
description: Transfers in/out. Tourist bus tour with English speaking guides. 4 nights accommodation in Istanbul with breakfast. 4 nights accommodation during the Anatolia tour with half board. Activities at destination according to itinerary. Entrance fees to museums. 4 meals during the tour in Turkey.

title: Punta Cana Summer Special
description: Get ready for an unforgettable summer in Punta Cana with our special package! Departure on February 12 from Mendoza with flights including carry-on luggage. Enjoy 7 nights at the luxurious Occidental Caribe Resort, where you can relax and enjoy all the amenities with an all-inclusive plan. Additionally, we offer arrival and departure transfers to ensure your trip is completely worry-free. Don't miss the chance to enjoy the paradisiacal beaches of Punta Cana this summer. Book now and get ready for a dream vacation!

title: Buzios
description: Enjoy an unforgettable vacation in Buzios with a departure on November 1! The package includes flights from Mendoza with Aerolíneas Argentinas, 7 nights of accommodation at the charming Posadas Buzios Colina, and arrival and departure transfers (IN/OUT). Relax and enjoy the beautiful beaches and vibrant culture of Buzios without worrying about anything. Book now and get ready to experience an incredible time in this Brazilian paradise!

title: San Andrés
description: Get ready for a dream vacation in San Andrés with a departure on September 3! Enjoy flights from Mendoza with Copa Airlines and 7 nights of accommodation at the Hotel Calypso Beach, located right on the beach. The package includes half board so you can enjoy delicious meals during your stay. Don't miss the chance to relax on the beautiful beaches of San Andrés and enjoy all the amenities this wonderful destination has to offer. Book now and experience an unforgettable vacation!

title: San Andrés
description: Get ready for an exciting adventure in San Andrés, Colombia! Enjoy flights from Mendoza with Copa Airlines and 7 nights of accommodation at Hotel Las Américas, where comfort and warm hospitality await you. Additionally, each morning you can start the day with energy thanks to the included breakfast. Immerse yourself in the crystal-clear waters of the Caribbean, explore the island's natural beauty, and discover its rich culture. Book now and get ready to experience unforgettable moments in San Andrés!

title: Aruba
description: Get ready for an unforgettable getaway to Aruba with our special offer! Departure on October 22 from Mendoza with convenient flights from Copa Airlines. Enjoy 8 nights of accommodation at the charming Posada The Coconut Inn, where warm hospitality and a delicious breakfast await you every morning. Additionally, we offer arrival and departure transfers to ensure your trip is completely worry-free. Immerse yourself in the crystal-clear waters of the Caribbean, relax on the white sandy beaches, and explore the charms of this beautiful island. Book now and get ready for an unforgettable experience in Aruba!

title: Aruba
description: Get ready for an exciting adventure in Aruba with our special offer! Departure on October 22 from Mendoza with convenient flights from Copa Airlines. Enjoy 8 nights of accommodation at the charming Posada Sandra Tours, where a cozy and authentic experience awaits you. Additionally, we offer arrival and departure transfers to ensure your trip is completely worry-free. Immerse yourself in the crystal-clear waters, explore the vibrant local culture, and relax on the white sandy beaches of this beautiful Caribbean island. Book now and prepare to create unforgettable memories in Aruba!
